They did run out of ammo in BW. The most notable occasion was in Coming of 
the fuzors pt. 2 in which the Maximals all ran out of ammo against the 
Predacons. And event hen they were shooting 40 blasts at a time, at the most 
Rattrap fire 3 shots at a time and at the most dinobot fired 2 blasts at a 
time. This is a real simulated war and thus charachters would run out of 
ammo, denying this fact makes no sense whatsoever. Its like fighting an army 
with a six shooter and saying it has unlimited ammo.

--part1_42.291f0a9f.2a4766c2_boundary
